trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of security available to a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 指定服務端點設定為接收 HTTP 要求可使用的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: WebHttpSecurity provides the security requirements for an endpoint configured with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: WebHttpSecurity 提供使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>設定之端點的安全性需求

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>所指定值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>方法，則所提供的設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>屬性成為有效的服務端點。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>只能在設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>會將它當做明確參數，而且其值無法再次設定之後建立繫結執行個體的建構函式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode of security that is used by an endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定設定為接收 HTTP 要求之端點所使用的安全性模式<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會決定是否從設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>屬性才會生效。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> ，指出是否使用傳輸層級安全性或無安全性的端點。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值不是有效<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: This is used for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: 這會用於 XAML 整合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the Transport property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 Transport 屬性是否已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: 這是由 WCF 用於 XAML 整合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，包含這個繫結的傳輸層級安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>這個屬性設定傳輸安全性參數<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>所傳回的物件</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>所指定值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>方法，則對服務端點而言變為有效的 [傳輸] 屬性所提供的設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>所指定值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>方法，則對服務端點而言變為有效的 [傳輸] 屬性所提供的設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>只能在設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>會將它當做明確參數，而且其值無法再次設定之後建立繫結執行個體的建構函式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>此繫結。</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The default values set are a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType*> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType*> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> = "".
trans-unit.target: 設定的預設值是<> *> 的<xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>、 <> </> *> 的<xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"> </xref>，和<xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*>=""。</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> </xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>
